div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2165 Sicily, before 1890 (973) Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (Newell) Contents: 10 AR Small denominations of Athenian type with Egyptian hieroglyphic symbols Disposition: Photiades Pacha Hoffman, May 19, 1890, lots 572-3 Mavrogordato, NC 1908, pp. 197-201, illus. Newell, NNM 82 (1938), pp. 59-60, illus.
